panels.title: Metal and VM - cpu-time and package
Metal and VM - cpu-time and package
Metal and VM - cpu-time and package
MAPE and MSE -  Metal vs VM

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
  abs(
     (
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )
    / on ()
    rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
  )[$__range:]

) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{pid='${process}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        sum(rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{job='vm' }[$__rate_interval]))
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{pid='${process}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

panels.title: MSE Metal vs VM BPF CPU TIme (${process})
MSE Metal vs VM BPF CPU TIme (${process})

targets.expr:
abs(
        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='vm', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
        ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='${mode}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])
